name: Detective Pea Pod
description:
Full version on Patreon

Hello everyone.

I present my new visual novel.

This novel will be about a young detective named Pea Pod.

This version of the novel will be completely free, but for those of you who want to learn more and get into the fantasies of the detective and the young witness on Patreon there will be a paid version of the game, as well as sound tracks for the game.
